bug.short_desc: SELinux is preventing iptables.init from 'execute_no_trans' accesses on the file /usr/bin/plymouth.
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: this happened under normal operation SELinux is preventing iptables.init from 'execute_no_trans' accesses on the file /usr/bin/plymouth.
***** Plugin catchall (100. confidence) suggests **************************
If you believe that iptables.init should be allowed execute_no_trans access on the plymouth file by default. Then you should report this as a bug. You can generate a local policy module to allow this access. Do allow this access for now by executing: # ausearch -c 'iptables.init' --raw | audit2allow -M my-iptablesinit # semodule -X 300 -i my-iptablesinit.pp
Additional Information: Source Context system_u:system_r:iptables_t:s0 Target Context system_u:object_r:plymouth_exec_t:s0 Target Objects /usr/bin/plymouth [ file ] Source iptables.init Source Path iptables.init Port <Unknown> Host (removed) Source RPM Packages Target RPM Packages plymouth-0.9.3-0.6.20160620git0e65b86c.fc25.x86_64 Policy RPM selinux-policy-3.13.1-224.fc25.noarch Selinux Enabled True Policy Type targeted Enforcing Mode Permissive Host Name (removed) Platform Linux (removed) 4.8.8-300.fc25.x86_64 #1 SMP Tue Nov 15 18:10:06 UTC 2016 x86_64 x86_64 Alert Count 1 First Seen 2016-11-25 03:12:01 PST Last Seen 2016-11-25 03:12:01 PST Local ID 9cdb4a2c-e980-427b-b422-7bbd5e2c9477
Raw Audit Messages type=AVC msg=audit(1480072321.499:603): avc: denied { execute_no_trans } for pid=16906 comm="iptables.init" path="/usr/bin/plymouth" dev="sda3" ino=7085791 scontext=system_u:system_r:iptables_t:s0 tcontext=system_u:object_r:plymouth_exec_t:s0 tclass=file permissive=1
Hash: iptables.init,iptables_t,plymouth_exec_t,file,execute_no_trans
Version-Release number of selected component: selinux-policy-3.13.1-224.fc25.noarch
Additional info: reporter: libreport-2.8.0 hashmarkername: setroubleshoot kernel: 4.8.8-300.fc25.x86_64 type: libreport
selinux-policy-3.13.1-225.3.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-f24b3ddc6a

selinux-policy-3.13.1-225.3.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-f24b3ddc6a
selinux-policy-3.13.1-225.3.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
